messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT-I need help with my computer
messages.msgSnippet: ... Try clearing chaches and deleting cookies. (Both are part of Preferences under Edit on the menu.) Just go through each page and click on anything that says
messages.messageBody:
on 6/26/02 8:43 AM, kmvioletta@... at kmvioletta@... wrote:

> I am having a big problem with my Internet Explorer and would love to know if
> anyone can help...sooooo sorry to interupt the board, but I can't get on to
> any websites, I can only receive mail! AOL isn't much help! Please e-mail
> me directly if you can help!

Try clearing chaches and deleting cookies. (Both are part of Preferences
under Edit on the menu.) Just go through each page and click on anything
that says Clear History, Empty Now. Try Reset to Default too.

On Macs putting the program's preferences file in the trash sometimes helps
too.

Have you upgraded AOL or your operating system? The version of IE may not be
entirely compatible.

You might try the same with AOL.

Joyce
